data.title: Amavi Aster Ridge Single-Family Rental Homes
data.meta_description: Learn More about the apartment features and amenities at Amavi Aster Ridge by Mill Creek.
data.text:
Mill Creek Residential has added to its Arizona presence with the development of Amavi Aster Ridge, a single-family build-to-rent community located in North Phoenix adjacent to Anthem, an award-winning master-planned community.

Amavi Aster Ridge features a mix of 177 two- and three-bedroom townhomes, each equipped with front-loaded garages, fenced private backyards and private patios or balconies. First move-ins are anticipated for March 2024.

Community amenities include a clubhouse/leasing office, outdoor swimming pool, onsite park with playground, controlled access technology, fitness studio and open green spaces. The community will also feature modern streetscapes and aesthetically manicured common areas.

Home interiors are equipped with stainless steel appliances, wood plank-style flooring, nine-foot ceilings, quartz countertops, tile backsplashes, smart thermostats, controlled guest-access technology, ceiling fans and in-home washers and dryers. The communityâ€™s 152 two-bedroom townhomes range from 1,223 to 1,454 square feet while the 25 three-bedrooms homes measure approximately 1,500 square feet.

Amavi Aster Ridge is directly adjacent to Anthem, which is well-regarded for its picturesque high-desert scenery, a high-performing school district and wide array of retail, dining and recreational outlets. The community is also situated within 15 minutes of the Taiwan Semiconductor campus, one of the anchors of the growing employment sector in the Anthem/Deer Valley area. Key commuter thoroughfares Interstate 17 and Anthem Way are also easily accessible from the community.
